Header: Custody of Zaharan’s daughter entrusted to the wife’s parents
Content: The four-year-old daughter of the National Thawheed Jamath Organization Mohamed Zaharan’s has been entrusted to the parents of his wife. The Criminal Investigations Department made a request from the judiciary to direct to a suitable guardianship the daughter of the Mohamed Zaharan. Accordingly she was entrusted to the parents of his wife. However, the Kuliyapitiya Probation Officer was ordered to supervise the child.
